data.use_token_auth: Use Token based authentication (Required for Firmware D7.x)

user.description:
- For Firmware D7.x please enter your login credentials for the Enlighten website as username and password and check `Use Token based authentication`.
 - For older models, enter username `envoy` without a password or enter username `installer` without a password for even older models.
 - For all other models, enter a valid username and password.
